description: This file defines a React custom hook named useDragDrop that provides functionality for drag-and-drop interactions via keyboard and mouse. It offers properties to spread onto draggable elements and drop targets, managing state internally for drag index and input modality.

methods.name: useDragDrop()
methods.description: React hook that manages drag-and-drop interactions, returning props to apply to draggable and droppable elements, handling drag state, and keyboard interactions.
